text: "Can't Buy Me Love" is a 1964 song by The Beatles. It was taken from their third studio album A Hard Day's Night. It topped the single charts in the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, Denmark, Ireland, the Netherlands, New Zealand and Sweden. It has been covered by jazz singer Ella Fitzgerald. == References == Category:1964 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Chet Atkins songs Category:Ella Fitzgerald songs Category:Pop songs
title: Can't Buy Me Love
